TopicTitle: The kraken’s main course, a save file

Articles.Content:
I started a new save file. Unintentionally, it became the kraken’s favorite. Here is the documentation of every mission conducted. Missions that aren't included are boring ones.

Mission 3: Science mission out of the atmosphere. Upon landing, the craft blew up 4/5 times though.

Mission 4: The kraken tipped over the lander. Pure anger flowed through me until I got it upright.

Mission 6: A bob spaghetti and an exploding lander. 

Missions 7 and 8: The kraken feasted on some geostationary satellites, until mission 9 got it right.

Mission 11: Uhh, Lithobraking should be enough said.

Mission 11.5: The refueling vessel for the rover's landing booster had robotic parts. It completed it's mission before the kraken finished it. This, and 13 are the only missions that don't have quicksave reloads.

Mission 12: It just- stopped. The rover didn't move in it's solar orbit at all over three years. I think it's in the kraken's refrigerator.

Mission 13: Can't make a maneuver node. The cursor's gone.

Mission 14: AKA The Launch of Olympus Station

Edited April 13, 2021 by Wizard Kerbal
So far, it sounds ok

21 minutes ago, linuxgurugamer said:

So far, it sounds ok

I updated it.
Happens to all of us.  I've had nights when I stream KSP and it's been nothing but total frustration.  Most nights it's fine, but sometimes, something just doesn't want to work
